summary:
Fortify the spell of "Summon Arniel's Shade" and "Arniel's Convection".
Add Two new destruction spell.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=4]Arniel Gane got lost to somewhere.
[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4]Why?
[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4]The reason was simple. He just seek a power.
[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4]Now, h[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4]e got a mighty power of the abyss, and has returned...
[/size][/font]
This mod fortify the spell of  "Summon Arniel's Shade" and "Arniel's Convection".
(These are available throhgh the Winterhold college quest "Arniel's Endeavor")
[size=3]
[color=#ea9999][b]Arniel's Shade[/b][/color][/size] will fight with these powerful skills.[list]
[*] Arniel's Convection
[*] Destruction Beam
[*] Ice Barrage
[*] Fire breath 
[*] Frost ball breath
[*] Powerful Melee Fight
[/list]
[color=#ea9999][size=3][b]Arniel's Convection[/b][/size][/color] damage increased and stagger effect is added.

[color=#ea9999][size=3][b]Destruction Beam[/b][/size][/color] is new spell of shock damage which decreases target's magic resist
[color=#ea9999][size=3][b]Ice Barrage[/b][/size][/color] is new too. Frost damage and paralyses the target for 1 sec.
Player also can use them. Spell tomes are placed where Arniel got disappeared.
author: Pumpkin Pie
